We recycle plastic bags by returning to recycle bin at store. Donate to humane society and missions who sale seconds for homeless and pet rescue. Great for dog poop pick up and diaper smell when traveling, kitty litter. If used appropriately not a problem. They deteriate in sun. Like paper bags too. Many uses. Only bad because of disrespectful lazy people who just toss them after first use. We live in rainy territory.. keeps items from being drenched. Do not like the thin cloth ones sold.. fall apart with first wash. Animal hair sticks to them. Yucky!
